title: You can choose between these two powers
body:
http://i1286.photobucket.com/albums/a610/Arduno/gliding_zpslcpbte94.jpg

Which one would you take for yourself?

1. The power to glide

You would't be able to fly but jumping from high places would never kill u 
Unless u land on something scary or don't watch out when you jump off something...

2. The power to change the color of anything you wear or touch

http://i1286.photobucket.com/albums/a610/Arduno/pick%20color_zpsuzdu4eah.jpg
